metadata.name: "Heavenly Portal"
metadata.description:
Original works:
Author: Juan Cruz Matarin
Year: 2020
Technique: Oilpainting on canvas
Dimensions: 2 x 1.5 m

Conexión is the first novel charity art exhibition to be completely tokenized in Latin America. 

https://wax.atomichub.io/explorer/asset/1099565802775

The NFTs of each artwork are doubly tokenized and certified in two platforms, atomic hub and foundation: with the support and guarantee of the blockchain network.
For the acquisition of the NFTs, it is done by: https://foundation.app/@artmatarin

Owner of his own original style, generating unexpected sensations.
Its technical resources (both in medium and supports) challenge and melt the traditional use of colors and figures; both in pastel charcoal pencil and oil paintings.
As in a trance, he is a “revelation artist”, he can give the observer the feelings of space and time in each stroke, and his figures impregnated with symbolisms are a portal between the visible and the invisible.
